trance.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a state in which you behave as if you were asleep but are still able to hear and understand what is said to you
trance.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She went into a deep hypnotic trance.
trance.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a state in which you are thinking about something so much that you do not notice what is happening around you
trance.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: What’s the matter with you? You’ve been in a trance all day.
trance.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a type of popular electronic dance music with a fast beat and long continuous notes played on a synthesizer
